title: The Alex Jones Show - Alex Jones - ALL FOUR PLUS HOURS - 29 Apr
description:
THE EMPIRE IS ON THE RUN..........All 4 PLUS Hours 

Alex is known for not just talking the talk, but walking the walk. He combines his media presence with actual physical activism, a practice that once led to him being arrested on the personal order of George W. Bush! Alex Jones has gained international attention for standing up for what he believes in.

From Italy&#039;s La Prensa to the Wall Street Journal and USA Today, Jones has brought the information war to the mainstream print media worldwide, speaking out against tyranny in defense of the Constitution.

Total Recorder 4.4 Capture in 48 kbs stereo from Ku satellite feed or 56 kbs internet streaming audio with commercial edit. About 6.25 hr listening time.

PM me with any of your comments.

Todays gueststopic: 

1st HR. - News and OpenLines.  Luke Rudowski of We Are Change and Stewart Howe of Change L.A. also make apperances. 

2nd HR. - News and OpenLines. Luke Rudowski of We Are Change and Stewart Howe of Change L.A. also make apperances. 

3rd HR. - News and OpenLines. Alex&#039;s guests today is G. Edward Griffin, film producer and author of The Creature from Jekyll Island: A Second Look at the Federal Reserve.

4th HR. - News and OpenLines. Alex&#039;s guests today is G. Edward Griffin, film producer and author of The Creature from Jekyll Island: A Second Look at the Federal Reserve. Len Horowitz also is a guest.

5th HR. - News and OpenLines. Alex&#039;s guests today is G. Edward Griffin, film producer and author of The Creature from Jekyll Island: A Second Look at the Federal Reserve.
